CustomField.description: SDO SPM Sales Planning demo field created by Aaron Bendickson 9-11-2023
CustomField.formula: IF( AnnualRevenue <= 3000000, "SMB", IF( AND( AnnualRevenue > 3000000, AnnualRevenue <= 5000000), "Commercial", IF( AnnualRevenue > 5000000, "Enterprise", "SMB")))
CustomField.label: Segment (Auto-Calc)
